  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 02

Words 101-200

  1. amount
    The amount of water in the glass is small.

  2. analyse
    We need to analyse the data carefully.

  3. analysis
    The analysis of the report took two days.

  4. ancient
    They visited an ancient castle during their trip.

  5. and
    She bought apples and oranges from the market.

  6. anger
    His anger was clear when he spoke loudly.

  7. angle
    The picture was taken from a different angle.

  8. angry
    She was angry because her phone was lost.

  9. animal
    The animal in the zoo looked very happy.

  10. ankle
    He hurt his ankle while playing football.

  11. anniversary
    They celebrated their wedding anniversary last week.

  12. announce
    The teacher will announce the results tomorrow.

  13. announcement
    The announcement about the event was made today.

  14. annoy
    Loud noises can annoy some people.

  15. annoyed
    She was annoyed by the constant interruptions.

  16. annoying
    The sound of the alarm was very annoying.

  17. annual
    The annual meeting will be held in December.

  18. another
    Can I have another cup of tea, please?

  19. answer
    He gave the correct answer to the question.

  20. anxious
    She felt anxious before the big exam.

  21. any
    Do you have any questions about the topic?

  22. anybody
    Anybody can join the club if they want.

  23. anyone
    Is there anyone who can help me with this?

  24. anything
    You can ask me anything about the project.

  25. anyway
    Anyway, let’s move on to the next topic.

  26. anywhere
    You can sit anywhere in the room.

  27. apart
    They live apart but still talk every day.

  28. apartment
    She rented a small apartment in the city.

  29. apologize
    He will apologize for being late to the meeting.

  30. app
    This app helps you learn new words every day.

  31. apparent
    It was apparent that she was very tired.

  32. apparently
    Apparently, the store is closed on Sundays.

  33. appeal
    The idea did not appeal to everyone in the group.

  34. appear
    He will appear on stage at 8 PM.

  35. appearance
    Her appearance at the party surprised everyone.

  36. apple
    She ate an apple for breakfast this morning.

  37. application
    He submitted his application for the job yesterday.

  38. apply
    You should apply for the scholarship this year.

  39. appointment
    I have an appointment with the doctor at 3 PM.

  40. appreciate
    I really appreciate your help with this task.

  41. approach
    The teacher used a new approach to explain the topic.

  42. appropriate
    This dress is appropriate for the formal event.

  43. approval
    The manager gave his approval for the new plan.

  44. approve
    The board will approve the budget next week.

  45. approximately
    The journey will take approximately two hours.

  46. April
    Her birthday is in April, during the spring.

  47. architect
    The architect designed a beautiful new building.

  48. architecture
    The city is famous for its modern architecture.

  49. area
    This area is known for its beautiful parks.

  50. argue
    They often argue about small things.

  51. argument
    The argument between them lasted for hours.

  52. arise
    Problems may arise if we do not plan well.

  53. arm
    He broke his arm while climbing the tree.

  54. armed
    The police were armed during the operation.

  55. arms
    She held the baby in her arms.

  56. army
    The army protected the country during the war.

  57. around
    They walked around the park in the evening.

  58. arrange
    Can you arrange the chairs for the meeting?

  59. arrangement
    The arrangement of the flowers was beautiful.

  60. arrest
    The police will arrest the suspect soon.

  61. arrival
    Her arrival at the party was unexpected.

  62. arrive
    They will arrive at the station in an hour.

  63. art
    She loves to study art and visit museums.

  64. article
    He wrote an article about climate change.

  65. artificial
    The flowers in the vase are artificial.

  66. artist
    The artist painted a beautiful landscape.

  67. artistic
    She has an artistic talent for drawing.

  68. as
    He works as a teacher in the local school.

  69. ashamed
    She felt ashamed of her mistake.

  70. ask
    Can I ask you a question about the project?

  71. asleep
    The baby was asleep in her crib.

  72. aspect
    One important aspect of the job is teamwork.

  73. assess
    The teacher will assess the students’ progress.

  74. assessment
    The assessment of the project was positive.

  75. assignment
    He completed the assignment before the deadline.

  76. assist
    Can you assist me with this heavy box?

  77. assistant
    The assistant helped the manager with the report.

  78. associate
    I associate summer with warm weather and beaches.

  79. associated
    The risks associated with the plan were discussed.

  80. association
    She joined the local sports association last year.

  81. assume
    I assume he will be late because of the traffic.

  82. at
    She is at the library studying for her exams.

  83. athlete
    The athlete won a gold medal in the competition.

  84. atmosphere
    The atmosphere in the room was very friendly.

  85. attach
    Please attach the file to the email before sending it.

  86. attack
    The soldiers planned an attack on the enemy base.

  87. attempt
    He made an attempt to solve the difficult problem.

  88. attend
    She will attend the meeting tomorrow morning.

  89. attention
    The teacher asked for the students’ attention.

  90. attitude
    His positive attitude helped him succeed.

  91. attract
    The flowers attract many bees in the garden.

  92. attraction
    The main attraction of the city is the old castle.

  93. attractive
    The design of the new building is very attractive.

  94. audience
    The audience clapped loudly after the performance.

  95. August
    They went on vacation in August last year.

  96. aunt
    My aunt lives in a small house near the beach.

  97. author
    The author of the book is very famous.

  98. authority
    The local authority is responsible for the park.

  99. autumn
    The leaves turn yellow in autumn.

  100. available
    The book is available in the library for everyone.
